title: When there were more donkeys than icosahedrons
tit2: 2. Direct the device to the mat, parallel to the ground. Ensure the device is pointing towards the back of the gallery
tit3: 3. Slowly rotate the camera so it can identify the ground

tit1: 1. Stand on the Start mark on the ground outside of the shipping container
tit2: 2. Direct the device to the Start mark, parallel to the ground. Ensure the device is pointing towards the end of the plaza
tit3: 3. Slowly rotate the camera so it can identify the ground
tit4: 4. Once the AR experience starts, you can walk through the totems on the plaza
bod4: Do not turn the device from vertical to horizontal (or visceversa) once the AR experience has began. It may affect the floor reading
